title: Select Data
description: Decide on the data to be used for analysis. Establish criteria for relevance to data mining goals, quality, and technical constraints such as limits on data volume or data types. Document rationale for inclusion or exclusion of datasets and attributes.

title: Verify Data Quality
description: Perform significance and correlation tests to decide if fields should be included. Reconsider data selection criteria based on data quality and exploration experiences. Determine attribute importance and weight attributes accordingly. Select relevant data subsets using advanced data reduction techniques such as Principal Component Analysis if needed.

title: Clean Data
description: Raise data quality to the level required by selected analysis techniques. Clean and preprocess data to address quality issues including imputing missing values, removing duplicates, handling outliers, addressing data noise, and dealing with special values and their meanings.

title: Prepare Data for Modelling
description: Transform and encode categorical variables as needed. Discretize or scale numerical variables if necessary. Implement sampling techniques for splitting test and training datasets. Split the data into training and testing sets in preparation for the modelling phase.

title: Documentation and Final Report
description: Compile comprehensive Data Preparation Report documenting all decisions, actions, and results from the data preparation phase. Ensure all deliverables are complete and properly documented.
deliverables: Data Selection criteria and rationale documented
All R/R Markdown code is well-commented and executable
Power BI visualizations are properly labeled and explained
Outstanding data quality issues and potential effects identified
All deliverables from previous tasks are included
References and citations are properly formatted
Executive summary provides clear overview of work completed
